summary: High-quality, high-resolution, handmade texture replacer for  Hide and Studded Hide armor sets
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=orange][size=4][b]Hi-Res texture replacer for the Hide and Studded Hide set[/b][/size][/color][/center]


[size=3][b][color=orange]Distribution permission[/color][/b]: This file is a [b]Nexus-exclusive release[/b], please respect my decision and DO NOT reupload it elsewhere... I did not give, nor want to give permission for any kind of reupload.[/size]


[size=3]   °°° HD  texture replacer for hide and studded hide set 

  °°°  same resolution as official hi-res dlc-textures
 
  °°°  as usual, anything has been redone from scratch

  °°°  This work should be compatible with pretty much everything, meshes replacers ,nif puzzles ,body modification for both gender

  °°° [b]INSTALLATION[/b]:  just drop the \"textures-folder\" inside your data-folder or use the mod manager.

about V2 update: this version has been created to be closer to vanilla design and colour palette, less dark and definitely more enjoyable in vanilla game and darker enb settings.

old v1 release files remain in download section as resource for modders INSIDE NEXUS SITES where their use is free, CONDITIO SINE QUA NON is that you give proper credits for the use of v1 release textures, in other words...always give credits for work that is not yours,or you\'re just stealing...seems fair and appropriate to me.

 IMPORTANT... this remake is not included in book of silence yet, will be included  in book of silence 2, so install this mod AFTER it, overriding eventually.



[/size]
author: CaBaL
